Citrus and Pomegranate Salad


Ingredients
2 pink or ruby-red grapefruits
2 navel oranges
4 tangerines
½ cup pomegranate arils
½ cup sour cream
¼ cup frozen lemonade concentrate, undiluted
fresh mint sprigs for garnish (optional)

Cooking Instructions

Peel grapefruits, oranges, and tangerines with a serrated
edge knife, being careful to remove the white pith. Slice
all citrus fruit crossways and remove any seeds. Evenly
distribute slices amongst 4 salad plates. Sprinkle
pomegranate arils evenly over each salad. Stir together sour
cream and undiluted lemonade concentrate in a small bowl for
the dressing until smooth. Drizzle dressing over each salad.
Garnish with mint sprigs.
